abstract: Chinalco said on Monday that it will not seek control of Rio Tinto, as it reassured Australia’s government over its planned $19.5 billion investment in the miner.
lead_paragraph: Chinalco said on Monday that it will not seek control of Rio Tinto, as it reassured Australia’s government over its planned $19.5 billion investment in the miner.

headline.main: Chinalco Says It Isn’t Seeking Control of Rio Tinto
